SHEPP IT

Improving your patient's digital
and physical experience.

Cutting edge technology is not enough.

When you have two providers offering the same
technology, services and treatments for the same costs,
Patient Experience is what makes patients choose one over the other.

Shepp it is a family owned consultancy specializing in merging patient care with innovative technology.

We’re Service Designers, which means we think about the whole picture. We want to work with you to ensure every single time a patient interacts with you, they have an incredible experience. We believe that all touchpoints, whether it’s through a mobile app or with your talented providers, matter. And we’re here to help you make them innovative, enjoyable, and impactful.

Shepp It Offerings

Patient Care and Service Training

With over 30 years of direct patient care experience, we believe exceeding patient expectations comes down to one simple philosophy: little changes go a long way.

Business Growth Opportunities

At the core of every great healthcare facility is a well run business. It just so happens, managing hospital and healthcare facilities runs in our family.

Tech Consolidation and Customization

Our team has worked at Epic, Aetna, and various Silicon Valley health start-ups. We know health tech and we know how to use the latest technology to empower, not hinder, your team.

Full Service Partnership Options

We wouldn't be worth a dime if we didn't practice what we preach. We believe in fully immersing with your team and prefer the term partner rather than consultant.

Let's Connect

Contact us to learn more about our offerings and how we can partner together.
